wikipedia_page.main: James Peacock (1871 – after 1896) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Stoke.

response: William James Peacock,  (born 14 December 1937) is an Australian molecular biologist who was Chief Scientist of Australia (2006–2008), President of the Australian Academy of Science (2002–2006) and Chief of CSIRO Plant Industry (1978–2003).Virginia Gewin, Jim Peacock, chief scientist, Canberra, Australia, Nature Vol 442, No 7099, pg 220, 12 July 2006. Retrieved 2009-11-04.
